featuredMods.name: Whats New?
featuredMods.author: NStudio
featuredMods.description: I will be beginning the development of being able to download folder mods and pak mods and also being able to import said pak mods very soon, and if you reading this.. Congrats! You own some of the first copies of Brick Rigs Mod Manager! Great things are coming your way. As of right now Automatic Updates are not a thing because i cant host a update server due to my wifi having a dynamic ip instead of a static ip

featuredMods.description: I will be beginning the development of being able to download folder mods and pak mods very soon, and if you reading this.. Congrats! You own some of the first copies of Brick Rigs Mod Manager! Great things are coming your way. As of right now Automatic Updates are not a thing because i cant host a update server due to my wifi having a dynamic ip instead of a static ip

featuredMods.name: Advanced Vehicle Pack
featuredMods.author: BrickMaster
featuredMods.description: This mod adds 15 new high-performance vehicles to the game, including sports cars, off-road vehicles, and military transports. Each vehicle is fully customizable and features realistic physics.

featuredMods.name: Building Tools Expansion
featuredMods.author: ConstructionCrew
featuredMods.description: Expands the building system with new tools, components, and quality-of-life improvements. Features include advanced snapping options, mirroring tools, and new structural elements.
